definition: (of a smell) strong/peak season (of a crop)/(classifier for the ordinal number of a crop, in the context of multiple harvests)
fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86

sentences.english: The Tartars employed another weapon, the so-called Chinese dragon belching fire.
sentences.chinese: 韃靼人使用了另一種武器，所謂中國龍噴火器。

sentences.english: Human Torch - Ludwigs Flamethrower, Shoots fire and starts people a blaze (Bind key for power).
sentences.chinese: 人肉噴火器向敵人噴火，需綁定熱鍵。

sentences.english: They are scorching the high school band with a flamethrower until they burn to death in Postal.
sentences.chinese: 還會在《郵差》中用噴火器將學校樂隊的成員燒死。
